metadata.text: @ShowCards(internalLink) There's a ton of amazing use cases for Digital People. Which one interests you most?

data.title: Use Cases - Business AI
data.description: Explore our use cases to see how our Digital People are built using AI for business solutions that are changing the future of customer experience.

examples: Can a Digital Person be used in Education?
Do you have examples of a Digital Person being used in education?
Can you give me a use case for Education
How could this be used in a school?
Show me a Digital Person in a University

metadata.text: @ShowCards(internalLink) We can help with everything from administrative support through to tutoring and career counselling. These services can be provided 24/7 in multiple languages with learning outcomes comparable to existing services.

data.title: Virtual Tutors in Education
data.description: From virtual tutors to academic advisors, learn how Soul Machines Digital People are transforming Education at scale.

metadata.text: @ShowCards(internalLink) We can provide Digital Twins, as well as fully artificial influences that can help organizations connect with audiences in a whole new way. These services can be provided 24/7 where ever your audience is.

data.title: Digital Twins in Entertainment
data.description: Meet the future of fan experience where Digital Twins and custom digital Influencers can interact and engage with broader audiences.

metadata.text: @ShowCards(internalLink) From answering patient questions to helping with the intake process, Digital People can support doctors and patients in all new ways. These services can be provided 24/7 in multiple languages where ever your customer is.

data.title: Healthcare

examples: What is Soul Machines all about?
Tell me about soul machines
I want to know about your company
Give me an overview of soul machines

metadata.text: @ShowCards(internalLink) Soul Machines is a leader in the humanization of AI, creating autonomously animated Digital People that empower organizations to reimagine customer experiences in todayâ€™s digital worlds and the metaverse. Soul Machines is the only company with a patented Digital Brain and Autonomous Animation technology delivering the full capabilities and goodness of human and machine collaboration in a responsive, relatable and unprecedented way.

data.title: About
data.description: Soul Machines is an AI company bringing the goodness of human-machine collaboration with avatars that improve the way we work, play and engage.

metadata.text: @ShowCards(internalLink) Soul Machines cultivates a range of creative and technical communities to advance the use of Digital People. Check them out here.

data.title: Support
data.description: Learn, exchange ideas, share information. Join our creators, writers and partners as we form metaverse communities.

metadata.text: @ShowCards(internalLink) We have a ton of resources for you to draw from. Soul Academy and the Writers Room will teach you how to build a Digital Person, and our support documentation will give you specific technical answers.

data.title: Apply to The Writers' Room
data.description: Upskill our Digital People. Broaden your toolkit. Become a Certified Conversation Designer.
